cards.title: Outlander
setup: At the start of the game, put {Outlander}'s villain character cards into play, “Fragemented Riftwarrior“ side up.
Search the villain deck for all Trace cards and put them beneath this card. Put 1 random Trace card from beneath this one into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Cards beneath this one are not considered in play. Trace cards are indestructible.
When {Outlander} would be destroyed instead flip his villain character cards.
cards.advanced: Whenever {Outlander} flips to this side, he becomes immune to damage until the start of the next villain turn.
flippedGameplay: When {Outlander} flips to this side, restore him to 20 HP, destroy all copies of Anchored Fragment, and put a random Trace into play. Then, if there are fewer than {H} Trace cards in play, flip {Outlander}'s villain character cards.
Cards beneath this one are not considered in play. Trace cards are indestructible.
Reduce the first damage dealt to {Outlander} each turn by {H}.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, destroy {H - 2} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.

openingLines.default: The blight of your “powers“ will be wiped clean from this Earth - and every other.
openingLines.TheKnightCharacter: You and I are but two traces of the same life. When yours ends, mine will grow stronger!
openingLines.BerserkerTheKnightCharacter: Your desperation is but a sliver of my own - stand down or fall.
openingLines.FairTheKnightCharacter: ...A child, playacting at valor. Cease thy mockery and leave me to my work.
openingLines.PastTheKnightCharacter: It appears your enchanted sleep was disturbed in an earlier age than my own. How did this come about?
openingLines.WastelandRoninTheKnightCharacter: I have never encountered a trace of myself from such a distant time. I wonder what power I will gain with your passing?
openingLines.DriftCharacter: So, there exists some reality where my lineage survived. Let us see if any trace of me remains in your blood, that I may absorb it.
openingLines.SplitDriftCharacter: Let us do battle! All the versions of me from across the numerous worlds, against the versions of you from across the ages.
openingLines.ThroughTheBreachDriftCharacter: My own kin would betray me? All who interfere with my quest will be cut down!
openingLines.DriftingShadowDriftCharacter: The guise of the silent assassin? You fight without honor.
openingLines.AllInGoodTimeDriftCharacter: How many versions of you are there, time traveler?
openingLines.TestSubjectHalberdDriftCharacter: What purpose does your metal cube serve?

cards.title: Anchored Fragment
body: When this card enters play, {Outlander} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.
At the start of the villain turn, if {Outlander} was not dealt at least {H} times 2 damage in the last round, destroy {H} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Strike this one down and the{BR}next just grows stronger.

cards.title: Archangel
body: The first time {Outlander} is dealt 4 or more damage from a single source each turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, {Outlander} deals each non-villain target irreducible 1 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: In many realities, Sir George{BR}of Mormoth had reawakened into{BR}considerably more advanced futures.

cards.title: Crusader
body: Increase damage dealt by {Outlander} by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {Outlander} deals the 2 non-villain targets with the highest HP 2 irreducible melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: The rift opened for me, that I might{BR}purge the evil from these new worlds.

cards.title: Dimensional Insinuation
body: When this card enters play, Search the villain deck for a copy of Anchored Fragment and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck and play its top card.
Damage dealt by {Outlander} is irreducible. At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: You are the betrayer. I have{BR}come to do what you could not.

cards.title: Disarming Blow
body: {Outlander} deals the 2 non-villain targets with the highest HP 3 melee damage each.
Any hero damaged this way discards 1 card.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm going to need a new suit.

cards.title: Dragonborn
body: The first time {Outlander} is dealt damage each turn, he deals the source of that damage 2 fire damage.
At the end of the villain turn, {Outlander} deals each non-villain target 1 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You have sided with chaos and the{BR}serpent. You have betrayed your oath!

cards.title: Knight's Hatred
body: Increase damage dealt by {Outlander} by 1.
Reduce damage dealt to {Outlander} by 1.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Yet another sorceror?{BR}There is no end to this scourge!

cards.title: Magekiller
body: The first time a hero one-shot enters play each turn, {Outlander} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 irreducible lightning damage.
At the end of the villain turn, {Outlander} deals the hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Magic cost me my life;{BR}now it shall help make amends!

cards.title: Out of Touch
body: When this card enters play, {Outlander} deals the non-villain target with the highest HP X+3 melee damage, where X is the number of Trace cards in play.
Reduce all HP recovery by 1. At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: This world will not miss{BR}you. Trust me on this.

cards.title: Riftblade Strikes
body: {Outlander} deals the non-villain target with the second highest HP 2 fire damage.
{Outlander} deals the non-villain target with the highest HP 4 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: There's no future where{BR}he misses with that thing.

cards.title: Transdimensional Onslaught
cards.body: {Outlander} deals each non-villain target X irreducible psychic damage, where X is the number of Trace cards in play.
cards.flavorText: He was no longer just a man; he{BR}was an amalgamation of every version{BR}of himself that had been lost.

cards.title: Warbrand
body: The first time {Outlander} deals damage each turn, he then deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage.
At the end of the villain turn, {Outlander} deals the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP 1 projectile damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: War never changes,{BR}but its weapons do.
